info.title: WuKongIM API
info.description: WuKongIM is a high-performance instant messaging system. This API documentation covers all REST endpoints for managing users, channels, messages, connections, and system operations.

get.description: Check the health status of the WuKongIM server and cluster
Get the result of database migration operations
Swagger UI interface for API documentation (available in development mode only)
Health check for the documentation service
Get the IM connection address for users

parameters.name: intranet
parameters.description: Whether to return intranet address (1 for true, 0 for false)

post.description: Get IM connection addresses for multiple users

parameters.name: intranet
parameters.description: Whether to return intranet address (1 for true, 0 for false)

post.description: Update authentication token for a user
Force a user device to quit/disconnect
Get online status for multiple users

get.description: Get list of system user IDs

Remove users from system UID list

200.description: System UIDs added to cache successfully

post.description: Remove system UIDs from cache only (internal use)

200.description: System UIDs removed from cache successfully

post.description: Update plugin number for a user
Remove a specific user connection
Kick/disconnect a specific user connection

post.summary: Create or Update Channel | 创建或更新频道
post.description:
Create a new channel or update an existing channel with basic information and initial subscribers. This is the primary endpoint for channel management.

**功能说明：**
- 创建新频道或更新现有频道
- 设置频道基本信息（大群、禁言、解散等状态）
- 添加初始订阅者（不支持个人频道）
- 支持重置订阅者列表
- 个人频道支持陌生人消息设置

**Channel Types:**
- 1: Person channel (个人频道) - Direct messaging
- 2: Group channel (群组频道) - Group messaging
- Other values: Custom channel types

**Important Notes:**
- Person channels (channel_type=1) do not support subscribers
- Use reset=1 to replace all existing subscribers
- Special characters in channel_id are not allowed
- System will automatically route to appropriate cluster node

value.error: 频道ID不能包含特殊字符！
个人频道不支持订阅者！
获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Update Channel Info | 更新频道信息
post.description:
Update or add channel basic information without affecting subscribers. This endpoint only modifies channel metadata and settings.

**功能说明：**
- 更新或添加频道基本信息
- 不影响现有订阅者
- 支持设置大群、禁言、解散等状态
- 个人频道支持陌生人消息设置
- 自动路由到相应集群节点

**Use Cases:**
- Change channel ban status
- Enable/disable large group mode
- Update send ban settings
- Configure stranger message permissions for person channels

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！

post.description:
Delete a channel permanently. This will disband the channel and clear all messages. Not supported for person channels.

**功能说明：**
- 永久删除频道
- 解散频道并清除所有消息
- 不支持个人频道（channel_type=1）
- 会自动清理相关订阅者和会话
- 操作不可逆，请谨慎使用

**Warning:** This operation is irreversible. All channel data including messages, subscribers, and settings will be permanently lost.

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Add Channel Subscribers | 添加频道订阅者
post.description:
Add subscribers to a channel. Not supported for person channels. Will create the channel if it doesn't exist.

**功能说明：**
- 向频道添加订阅者
- 不支持个人频道（channel_type=1）
- 如果频道不存在会自动创建
- 支持重置现有订阅者
- 会自动创建相关会话

**Use Cases:**
- Add new members to a group
- Bulk add subscribers
- Reset entire subscriber list
- Create channel with initial subscribers

value.error: 个人频道不支持订阅者！
频道ID不能包含特殊字符！
获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Remove Channel Subscribers | 移除频道订阅者
post.description:
Remove subscribers from a channel. Not supported for person channels. Will also delete their conversations with the channel.

**功能说明：**
- 从频道移除订阅者
- 不支持个人频道（channel_type=1）
- 会自动删除被移除用户的相关会话
- 被移除用户将无法接收频道消息

**Use Cases:**
- Remove members from a group
- Bulk remove subscribers
- Clean up inactive users
- Manage group membership

value.error: 个人频道不支持订阅者操作！
频道ID不能包含特殊字符！
获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Remove All Channel Subscribers | 移除频道所有订阅者
post.description:
Remove all subscribers from a channel. Not supported for person channels. Will also delete all related conversations and tags.

**功能说明：**
- 移除频道的所有订阅者
- 不支持个人频道（channel_type=1）
- 会自动删除所有相关会话
- 会清除频道标签（tag）

**Use Cases:**
- Clear all members from a group
- Reset channel membership
- Prepare channel for deletion

value.error: 个人频道不支持此操作！
获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Set Temporary Channel Subscribers | 设置临时频道订阅者
post.description:
Set subscribers for a temporary channel. This is an internal API used for cluster node communication to manage temporary channel subscriptions.

**功能说明：**
- 设置临时频道的订阅者
- 这是内部API，用于集群节点间通信
- 临时频道用于特殊场景，如临时群组或会话
- 会自动创建和管理频道标签（tag）

**注意：** 此接口主要用于系统内部调用，不建议外部直接使用。

value.error: 频道ID不能包含特殊字符！
获取频道所在节点失败！

post.description: Send a message to a channel
Send multiple messages in batch
Message synchronization in write mode (will be deprecated)
Message synchronization acknowledgment in write mode (will be deprecated)
Search for multiple messages
Search for a single message
Synchronize messages from a channel with pagination support

get.description: Get the maximum message sequence number for a channel
Get the last message of a channel. For personal channels, login_uid is required to construct the correct channel identifier.

parameters.name: login_uid
parameters.description: Login user ID (required for personal channels, channel_type=1)

404.description: Channel not found or no messages in channel

post.description: Clear unread count for a conversation
Set unread count for a conversation
Delete a conversation
Synchronize user conversations
Synchronize recent messages for conversations
Get channel collection for recent conversations
Synchronize conversation data by specified channel collection

post.summary: Add Channel Blacklist | 添加频道黑名单
post.description:
Add users to channel blacklist. Blacklisted users cannot send or receive messages in the channel and their conversations will be deleted.

**功能说明：**
- 将用户添加到频道黑名单
- 黑名单用户无法在频道中发送或接收消息
- 会自动删除黑名单用户的相关会话
- 不支持个人频道（channel_type=1）
- 直播频道（live channel）不处理会话删除

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Set Channel Blacklist | 设置频道黑名单
post.description:
Set (replace) the entire blacklist for a channel. This will remove all existing blacklist entries and replace them with the provided list.

**功能说明：**
- 设置（替换）频道的完整黑名单
- 会先清除所有现有黑名单条目，然后添加新的条目
- 如果UIDs为空，则清空整个黑名单
- 会自动删除黑名单用户的相关会话
- 直播频道（live channel）不处理会话删除

post.summary: Remove Channel Blacklist | 移除频道黑名单
post.description:
Remove specific users from channel blacklist. Removed users will have their conversations restored if applicable.

**功能说明：**
- 从频道黑名单中移除指定用户
- 会恢复被移除用户的会话（如果适用）
- 直播频道（live channel）不处理会话恢复

post.summary: Remove All Channel Blacklist | 移除频道所有黑名单
post.description:
Remove all users from channel blacklist.

**功能说明：**
- 移除频道的所有黑名单用户
- 清空后所有之前被拉黑的用户可以重新访问频道
- 支持所有频道类型

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！

post.summary: Add Channel Whitelist | 添加频道白名单
post.description:
Add users to channel whitelist. Only whitelisted users can send messages to the channel when whitelist mode is enabled.

**功能说明：**
- 将用户添加到频道白名单
- 启用白名单模式时，只有白名单用户可以向频道发送消息
- 对于个人频道，会自动创建相关会话
- 支持所有频道类型

value.error: 频道ID不能包含特殊字符！

post.summary: Set Channel Whitelist | 设置频道白名单
post.description:
Set (replace) the entire whitelist for a channel. This will remove all existing whitelist entries and replace them with the provided list.

**功能说明：**
- 设置（替换）频道的完整白名单
- 会先清除所有现有白名单条目，然后添加新的条目
- 如果UIDs为空，则清空整个白名单
- 支持所有频道类型

post.summary: Remove Channel Whitelist | 移除频道白名单
post.description:
Remove specific users from channel whitelist.

**功能说明：**
- 从频道白名单中移除指定用户
- 移除后用户将无法向频道发送消息（如果启用白名单模式）
- 支持所有频道类型

value.error: 频道ID不能包含特殊字符！

post.summary: Remove All Channel Whitelist | 移除频道所有白名单
post.description:
Remove all users from channel whitelist.

**功能说明：**
- 移除频道的所有白名单用户
- 清空后如果频道启用白名单模式，将没有用户可以发送消息
- 支持所有频道类型

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！

post.description: Remove a tag
Login for manager access

Send various types of events to channels, including streaming text messages and custom events. Supports AG-UI protocol events for real-time streaming communication.

**Event Types Supported:**
- `___TextMessageStart`: Start a streaming text message session
- `___TextMessageContent`: Send content chunks for streaming text
- `___TextMessageEnd`: End a streaming text message session
- `___ToolCallStart`: Start a tool call event
- `___ToolCallArgs`: Send tool call arguments
- `___ToolCallEnd`: End a tool call event
- `___ToolCallResult`: Send tool call results
- Custom event types for application-specific events

**Streaming Message Flow:**
1. Send `___TextMessageStart` to initiate a stream
2. Send multiple `___TextMessageContent` events with message chunks
3. Send `___TextMessageEnd` to close the stream

**Important Notes:**
- The same `client_msg_no` must be used for all events in a streaming session
- Only one stream can be active per channel unless `force=1` is used
- For person channels, the system automatically handles fake channel ID generation
- Events are automatically routed to the appropriate cluster node

**Usage Examples:**

*Streaming Text Message:*
```bash
# 1. Start stream
curl -X POST /event \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "client_msg_no": "stream_001",
    "channel_id": "user_123",
    "channel_type": 1,
    "from_uid": "ai_bot",
    "event": {
      "type": "___TextMessageStart",
      "data": "Starting response..."
    }
  }'

# 2. Send content chunks
curl -X POST /event \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "client_msg_no": "stream_001",
    "channel_id": "user_123",
    "channel_type": 1,
    "from_uid": "ai_bot",
    "event": {
      "type": "___TextMessageContent",
      "data": "Hello! How can I help you?"
    }
  }'

# 3. End stream
curl -X POST /event \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "client_msg_no": "stream_001",
    "channel_id": "user_123",
    "channel_type": 1,
    "from_uid": "ai_bot",
    "event": {
      "type": "___TextMessageEnd",
      "data": ""
    }
  }'
```

*Custom Event:*
```bash
curl -X POST /event \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "client_msg_no": "custom_001",
    "channel_id": "group_456",
    "channel_type": 2,
    "from_uid": "system",
    "event": {
      "type": "user_joined",
      "timestamp": 1640995200000,
      "data": "{\"user_id\": \"new_user\", \"username\": \"Alice\"}"
    }
  }'
```

**Chinese Description:**
发送各种类型的事件到频道，包括流式文本消息和自定义事件。支持AG-UI协议事件，用于实时流式通信。支持文本消息流、工具调用等多种事件类型。流式消息需要按顺序发送开始、内容、结束事件，使用相同的client_msg_no标识。

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force end existing streams in the channel before starting a new one (1 for true, 0 for false)

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or event data

missing_event_type.summary: Missing event type | 缺少事件类型
missing_event_type.description: Event type is required and cannot be empty

missing_client_msg_no.summary: Missing client message number | 缺少客户端消息编号
missing_client_msg_no.description: Client message number is required for tracking

invalid_data_format.summary: Invalid data format | 数据格式错误

stream_already_running.summary: Stream already running in channel | 频道中已有流在运行
stream_already_running.description: Cannot start a new stream when another is active. Use force=1 to override.

value.error: 频道中已有流正在运行！
value.error_en: A stream is already running in the channel!
value.suggestion: Use ?force=1 to force end existing streams

stream_not_found.summary: Stream not found | 流不存在
stream_not_found.description: The specified stream does not exist or has expired

stream_closed.summary: Stream already closed | 流已关闭
stream_closed.description: Cannot send content to a closed stream

channel_mismatch.description: Stream channel does not match the request channel

cluster_error.summary: Cluster node error | 集群节点错误
cluster_error.description: Failed to determine which cluster node handles the channel

value.error: 获取频道所在节点失败！
value.error_en: Failed to get channel's cluster node!

stream_processing_error.summary: Stream processing error | 流处理错误
stream_processing_error.description: Error occurred while processing stream message events

value.error: 处理消息开始事件失败！
value.error_en: Failed to process message start event!

message_send_error.summary: Message send error | 消息发送错误
message_send_error.description: Failed to send the event message

stream_force_end_error.summary: Force end stream error | 强制结束流错误
stream_force_end_error.description: Failed to force end existing streams

value.error_en: Failed to force end other streams!

ChannelCreateRequest.description: Request to create or update a channel with its basic information and initial subscribers.

channel_id.description: Channel ID. Cannot be empty or contain special characters.

large.description: Whether it's a large group (0=no, 1=yes). Large groups have different performance characteristics.

ban.description: Whether the channel is banned (0=no, 1=yes). Banned channels prevent all users from sending/receiving messages except system accounts.

disband.description: Whether the channel is disbanded (0=no, 1=yes). Disbanded channels are marked as deleted.

send_ban.description: Whether sending messages is banned (0=no, 1=yes). When enabled, all members cannot send messages but can receive them. For person channels, the user can receive but not send messages.

allow_stranger.description: Whether to allow strangers to send messages (0=no, 1=yes). Currently only supported for person channels. When enabled, strangers can send messages to the user.

reset.description: Whether to reset subscribers (0=no, 1=yes). When enabled, all existing subscribers will be removed before adding new ones.

subscribers.description: List of initial subscriber user IDs. Not supported for person channels (channel_type=1).

ChannelInfoRequest.description: Request to update or add channel basic information without affecting subscribers.

allow_stranger.description: Whether to allow strangers to send messages (0=no, 1=yes). Only supported for person channels.

ChannelRequest.description: Generic channel request containing only channel_id and channel_type.

ChannelDeleteRequest.description: Request to delete a channel. This will disband the channel and clear all messages. Not supported for person channels.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to delete. Cannot be empty.

channel_type.description: Channel type. Cannot be 1 (person channel). (2=group, etc.)

SubscriberAddRequest.description: Request to add subscribers to a channel. Not supported for person channels. Will create the channel if it doesn't exist.

channel_id.description: Channel ID. Cannot be empty or contain special characters.

channel_type.description: Channel type. Defaults to 2 (group) if 0. Cannot be 1 (person channel).

reset.description: Whether to reset existing subscribers (0=no, 1=yes). When enabled, all existing subscribers will be removed before adding new ones.

temp_subscriber.description: Whether these are temporary subscribers (0=no, 1=yes). Temporary subscribers are no longer supported in new versions.

subscribers.description: List of user IDs to add as subscribers. Cannot be empty.

SubscriberRemoveRequest.description: Request to remove subscribers from a channel. Not supported for person channels. Will also delete their conversations.

channel_id.description: Channel ID. Cannot be empty or contain special characters.

channel_type.description: Channel type. Cannot be 1 (person channel). (2=group, etc.)

temp_subscriber.description: Whether these are temporary subscribers (0=no, 1=yes). Temporary subscribers are no longer supported in new versions.

subscribers.description: List of user IDs to remove from subscribers. Cannot be empty.
Specific subscribers to send message to

no_persist.description: Whether message should not be persisted (0=persist, 1=no persist)

red_dot.description: Whether to show red dot notification (0=no, 1=yes)

sync_once.description: Whether message should be synced only once (0=no, 1=yes)

message_seq.description: Message sequence number (required for large groups)

last_msg_seqs.description: Client's last message sequences for all conversations. Format: channelID:channelType:last_msg_seq|channelID:channelType:last_msg_seq

msg_count.description: Number of recent messages to include per conversation

exclude_channel_types.description: Array of channel types to exclude from results

BlacklistRequest.description: Request to manage channel blacklist. For blacklist_set operation, uids can be empty to clear the entire blacklist.

channel_id.description: Channel ID. Cannot be empty or contain special characters.

uids.description: List of user IDs to add/remove from blacklist. Required for add/remove operations, optional for set operation.

WhitelistRequest.description: Request to manage channel whitelist. For whitelist_set operation, uids can be empty to clear the entire whitelist.

channel_id.description: Channel ID. Cannot be empty or contain special characters.

uids.description: List of user IDs to add/remove from whitelist. Required for add/remove operations, optional for set operation.

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return

count.description: Number of items with this tag

message_seq.description: Client's maximum message sequence number for incremental sync

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to sync

channels.description: List of channels to sync messages for

msg_count.description: Number of messages to retrieve per channel

order_by_last.description: Whether to order by last message (1=yes, 0=no)

msg_count.description: Number of recent messages to return per conversation

TmpChannelSubscriberSetRequest.description: Request to set subscribers for a temporary channel. Used for internal cluster communication.

channel_id.description: Temporary channel ID. Cannot contain special characters.

uids.description: List of user IDs to set as subscribers for the temporary channel

EventRequest.description: Request payload for sending events to channels. Used for both streaming messages and custom events.

client_msg_no.description: Client message number - must be unique and not repeated. Used to identify and track the message/stream. For streaming messages, all events in the same stream should use the same client_msg_no. UUID format is recommended.

channel_id.description: Target channel ID where the event will be sent. For person channels, this should be the target user ID. For group channels, this should be the group ID.

channel_type.description:
Channel type that determines how the message is routed:
- 1: Person/Direct message channel
- 2: Group channel
- Other values: Custom channel types

from_uid.description: Sender user ID. If not provided or empty, defaults to the system UID. This identifies who is sending the event.

event.data: Hello! How can I help you today?

id.description: Event ID (optional, auto-generated for some event types)

type.description:
Event type - supports AG-UI protocol events and custom events. AG-UI events enable real-time streaming communication for AI applications.

**AG-UI Protocol Events:**
- `___TextMessageStart`: Initiates a streaming text message session
- `___TextMessageContent`: Sends content chunks during streaming
- `___TextMessageEnd`: Terminates a streaming text message session
- `___ToolCallStart`: Begins a tool/function call event
- `___ToolCallArgs`: Sends arguments for tool calls
- `___ToolCallEnd`: Ends a tool call event
- `___ToolCallResult`: Returns results from tool execution

**Custom Events:** Any string not starting with `___` is treated as a custom event type.

timestamp.description: Event timestamp (optional, Unix timestamp in milliseconds)

data.description:
Event data content. The format depends on the event type:

**For Text Message Events:**
- `___TextMessageStart`: Initial message content or metadata
- `___TextMessageContent`: Text chunk for streaming
- `___TextMessageEnd`: Final content or completion marker

**For Tool Call Events:**
- `___ToolCallStart`: Tool name or metadata
- `___ToolCallArgs`: JSON string with function arguments
- `___ToolCallEnd`: Completion status
- `___ToolCallResult`: JSON string with execution results

**For Custom Events:** Any string data relevant to your application

text_content.value: Hello, this is a streaming message chunk
